title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), for the purpose of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Global Value Chains) Order
text_raw: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Global Value Chains) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (global value chains) order

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), for the purpose of
section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), for the purpose of
heading: In this Order –
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order – 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 27 November 20191as amended by Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212; 

“survey” means the Global Value Chains Survey that is conducted by the Central 
Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information referred to in 
Article 4.
text_norm: 2 order - regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 20191as amended commission delegated regulation (eu) 2021 1704 14 july 20212 survey mean global value chain survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information referred article 4

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), for the purpose of
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that –
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that – 

(a) 

(b) 

engages 50 or more persons, and 

is classified for statistical purposes under section B, C, D, E, F, 
G, H, I, J, K, L, M, or N of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to 
Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 20 December 20063, as amended by Regulation 
(EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 11 March 20084, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 20125 and 
Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 20 June 20196.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), for the purpose of
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified – 

(a) 

in subparagraphs (b) to (h) of paragraph (1) and paragraph (2) of 

1 OJ No. L 327, 17.12.19, p.1. 
2 OJ No. L 339, 24.9.2021, p. 33. 
3 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1. 
4 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13. 
5 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1. 
6 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [394] 3 

the Schedule, in relation to each year in the period from 2021 to 
2023, and 

(b) 

in paragraph 1(a) of the Schedule, in relation to 2023, 

is hereby prescribed.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), for the purpose of
heading: 5. The Statistics (Global Value Chains Survey) Order 2021 (S.I. No. 166 of
text_raw:
5. The Statistics (Global Value Chains Survey) Order 2021 (S.I. No. 166 of 

2021) is revoked. 

 
 
 4 [394]

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), for the purpose of
heading: Article 4

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), for the purpose of
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking 

concerned: 

(a) 

the number of persons engaged at the end of the year per business 
function; 

(b) global value chain arrangements, including – 

(i) 

the purchase of goods, materials and services from, and 

(ii) 

the supply of goods, materials and services to, 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

undertakings outside the State; 

international sourcing of business functions; 

jobs created as a result of international sourcing of business 
functions; 

jobs lost as a result of international sourcing of business 
functions; 

(f) motivations for, and barriers to, international sourcing of business 

functions; 

(g) 

events impacting global value chain arrangements.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates undertaking concerned (a) number person engaged end year per business function (b) global value chain arrangement including - (i) purchase good material service (ii) supply good material service (c) (d) (e) undertaking outside state international sourcing business function job created result international sourcing business function job lost result international sourcing business function (f) motivation barrier international sourcing business function (g) event impacting global value chain arrangement

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), for the purpose of
heading: Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to complete
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to complete 
the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

7 August, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
